features: Easy to travel with your baby's dr brown baby bottle cap lids with our screw caps and travel caps, splash proof baby bottle caps, Keep the contents of the bottle safe and secure in the refrigerator during transportation and heating.
Baby bottle caps are made of high-quality materials that are durable and leak-proof, ensuring that your baby's milk or formula stays fresh and safe.
Compatible with dr brown bottles 100% seal.

Designed specifically for dr brown Wide Mouth Bottles with a 1.77" bottle mouth, our screw lids quickly and easily replace the natural bottle sealing ring and sealing disc,Suitable for most standard mouth bottles(8pcs)
body.description: The Screw Lids Aka Travel Caps with Rewritable Sealing Disc. These travel caps are compatible with dr brown Wide Mouth Bottles, and have a bottle mouth compatibility of 1.77", making them the ideal choice for parents on the go. Our travel caps come in a set of four, so you'll always have a spare one handy when needed. These caps are perfect for those moments when you need to store or transport a bottle of milk or juice, without worrying about leaks or spills. The cap can also replace the natural bottle sealing ring and sealing disc, giving you extra peace of mind. These screw lids are designed with safety in mind. We know how important it is to keep your baby's bottle clean and free from harmful bacteria. That's why our travel caps feature a rewritable sealing disc which can be easily wiped clean, ensuring your baby's bottle is completely hygienic. Our screw lids are also a great alternative to traditional plastic bottle caps. They are made from high quality, BPA-free materials, making them safe for your little one to use. And at just the right size, they are the perfect replacement for lost or damaged bottle caps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Avent natural bottles perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I got these for when I pump in the middle of the night into Avent naturals bottles and am too tired to bag my milk (I’ve spilled too much milk than I care to admit). These come in a pack of 8 and they have a silicone sealing ring in the lids. They fit my bottles perfectly without any leaks! I’ll update if I have any problems but I’ve been keeping bottles stored sideways in a cooler bag at night and haven’t had any leaks yet. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Avent and great for formula making
reviews.reviewText: I like using these caps for when I'm making formula. I put the cap on and can shake vigorously without worrying about spilling. I've had terrible luck with shaking with the nipple and cover on and getting it spraying everywhere. These are also great for a slightly smaller profile when travelling.
